snippet.title: One Card One Shot: Mafia - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Get ready to enter the world of the mafia. Watch the trailer for One Card One Shot - Mafia for a peek at this upcoming card game. In One Card One Shot: Mafia, choose a mission and hit the target in seconds! What awaits you with each card turned over? Will you become the legend feared by all or will you fall into oblivion? One Card One Shot - Mafia will be available on PC.
